Name: Berserk Soccer
About the game: Berserk Soccer is a low poly style game that is between a street fight and soccer. You will play with international teams in this game. Each of them has a unique team ability, special foul and shoot, which are mostly related to that country. Some have different playing fields, too. In addition to scoring a goal, you can also prevail with fouls in this game. You will try to win the world cup with a team that you are allowed to select. Just the world cup ? Maybe not. You can play the game with your friends in the same computer or over Steam. You can be either in the same team or rivals against eachother. You can play a tournament in a same team together, too ! This game is built to put the violence in soccer. If you are into clean soccer, consider that there is high possibility that you might be beaten up. Being ruhtless is the way to play this game.
